code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{controlDevice}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function GateControl(_ref){let{device}=_ref;const[busy,setBusy]=useState(false);const act=async action=>{setBusy(true);try{await controlDevice(device.id,device.type,action,{});}catch(e){console.error(e);}finally{setBusy(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"device-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>act('open'),disabled:busy,children:"Open Gate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn secondary",onClick:()=>act('close'),disabled:busy,children:"Close Gate"})]});}
